Interface SpamBot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface SpamBot
    A spambot

    • Method Detail

      • setSeed

        void setSeed(java.lang.String seedUrl)
             throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Sets the seed. The seed is the very first URL that has to be given to the system. The associated web page is the starting point for the whole process of fetching web pages, extracting their links and email addresses, and fetching more web pages. *
        Parameters:
        seedUrl - the first URL to fetch and analyse
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • getSeed

        java.lang.String getSeed()
        Returns the seed URL. * @return the seed URL.

      • setThreads

        void setThreads(int count)
        Sets the number of threads. * The user should be able to set the number of threads to be used for running the crawlers. *
        Parameters:
        count - the number of threads (i.e. crawlers) to start in parallel

      • scanSite

        void scanSite()
        Initiates the scanning process.

      • getEMails

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getEMails()
        Returns all the emails gathered. * This method should be executed only after the last crawlers have stopped. If it is called before that point, its behaviour is not defined.
